name: Documentum Object Model Exporter
short_description:
The Documentum Object Model Exporter permits the export of a subpart of your Documentum object model as a printable image. For each each analyzed object type, the tool will display the following diagram on the output graph:
- the different attributes of the type including its name, type, length, value assistance, repeating/mandatory, value assistance query
- whether or not the doctype has a tbo attached
- the filestore defined for the doctype (if any)

You may specify a lot of export options like:
- whether to display parent's attributes
- whether to display dm_sysobject attributes
- a list of doctypes to skip
- ...

The complete user guide for the tool can be found at the following location:

http://stephanemarcon.wordpress.com/2014/10/12/exporting-documentum-object-model-as-a-graph-using-graphviz/
summary: A simple tool to export a Documentum object model
